title.jp: Ruby wo Sagase! / Mahou no Ishi de Magical Change!

synopsis:
Search for Ruby!: 7 years ago, Airi Kirara encountered a Jewelpet named Ruby during her childhood and wanted to see her do magic. Now years later, Airi met other Jewelpets while cleaning the house until she notices that Ruby is missing. As they find her in a warehouse, the two discover a new ability.

Magical Change with a Magical Stone!: Feeling confused about Ruby's transformation, her childhood friend Laura finally arrives from France to greet her and tell her that a thief is about to steal a precious pendant, and Airi needs to guard it. But they didn't know it was all an elaborated trap.

title.jp: Yume-darake no Laura / Labra, wo Tsukai Suru Love

synopsis:
Laura, Full of Dreams: Laura has grown up as a rich heir of her family's company, but she is still saddened that there are things missing from her life. When she falls in love with Airi's brother, things start to get complicated.

Labra is Going Out on an Errand of Love: When the Kirara Family has Curry Katsu for dinner, they don't realize at the last minute that they're all out of Fukujinzuke. Now, its Labra's turn to do the shopping work, despite her lack of knowledge of humans and more importantly, her age.

title.jp: Idol ni Magical Change! / Shippo Nante Dai Kirai!

synopsis:
Magical Change Idol!: The first ever Jewel Mall Image Girl contest is being held in Airi's town, and Larima wished that she can join the contest in her dreams to become an Idol. However, things get rather competitive..

I Despise My Tail!: Larima always lose to hide and seek due to her big tail being exposed all the time. She herself wished that her tail is shorter and cast a spell on it, however she is unaware of the consequences..

title.jp: Mahou nante Iranai!? / Papa tte Donna Hito?

synopsis:
You don't even need Magic!?: Airi's older brother Sakutaro wanted to prove that everything in the world isn't about magic and can be solved by science. He develops a mechanical pet that can be as reliable as a Jewelpet, but can it hold up to Ruby and the others?

What kind of person is Dad?: Luna tries to find out and guess what kind of person Airi's father is and regarding to the Magical Change Stone Airi had. With all she knows that he is in a business trip, she and the others decided to guess how did he look like..

title.jp: Melonpan Carnival / Soshite Minna Inaku natta

synopsis:
Melonpan Carnival: Due to a budget crisis, the Kirara Family can only eat Melonpan everyday. Things get out of control however when a Melonpan Carnival began...

And Everyone's gone: Labra noticed that everyone in town is gone, especially her Jewelpet Friends. Airi decided to team up with her to investigate..
